attributes.action: Change the current Stamp Duty charges !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stamp duty should be charged with base lines,similar to personal taxation.
In other words Instead of Taxing at 1,2,3or4% on total sale price of Asset(Residential or Commercial).But start the Tax at the already established levels.In other words the new 175k threshold 180k sale,charging 1% on 5k not 180k.
